actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to terminate the authority for the pursuit of flight training programs by veterans and for the pursuit of correspondence training programs by veterans, spouses, and surviving spouses, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Terminates educational assistance for flight training courses for veterans and correspondence training courses for veterans, spouses, and surviving spouses.

titles.title: A bill to terminate the authority for the pursuit of flight training programs by veterans and for the pursuit of correspondence training programs by veterans, spouses, and surviving spouses, and for other purposes.
